title: How is medical imaging used for delineation of treatment area for cancer? - Quora

response.answer_text: Delineation of cancer treatment area With the imaging data, the clinical team can delineate different structures in the treatment area (eg. tumor, important organs).Delineation must also account for:Tumor regions of different density,Changes in shape during treatment,Movement,And treatment setup inaccuracies.Delineation facilitates dose prescription.
